original_title: Sesame Street: The Best Pet in the World
overview: Who is the best pet on Sesame Street? Is it Zoe's pet rock Rocco or Telly's hamster Chuckie Sue? Could it be Elmo's fish Dorothy or Baby Bear's parrot Ralphie? Find out when Maria helps the friends settle the issue.
title: Sesame Street: The Best Pet in the World
